name: Charon 5
description:
Magazine advertisement (from Ad Blurbs)

Charon 5 is an unparalleled design concept that combines strategy with Arcade action to produce a game of epic proportions. The action takes place on over 5,400 full color screens spread throughout 11 action packed levels. The game is further enhanced by the use of exceptional true stereo sound and music.

You must exhibit skill, have concentration, possess good reflexes and not be faint of heart in order to be successful on your mission against Charon 5.
